name: Firefox - LessChrome HD - Silver
description:
I dislike the default blue tint on the toolbars under Windows 7, but I'm a big lover of the LessChrome HD addon. I've created this style in order to pretty things up a bit. This style will also change the look of your Firefox "appmenu button".

This style will also remove the transparency and dropshadow from the Firefox address bar that is caused by installing LessChrome HD.
additional_info:
Version 2.2: Minor tweaks and color updates.

Version 2.0: Made some drastic changes to the style of the tabs. They stood out too much on Windows 7 with aero glass enabled. This update should make them blend in a little better without making them unreadable. I may make a few more adjustments over the next couple days. Mozilla's UI documentation is. . . well, there essentially is none.

Version 1.0: This is he first complete version of the style. Not all view "modes" have been tested. Works with Firefox 6. Let me know if you find any bugs.
